ViewObject.Name: PurchaseRegisterIncludingDRandCRNoteVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery:
Select "UNIT CODE", "VOUCHER NO", "VOUCHER DATE", "DOC NO", "DOC DATE", "VENDOR BILL NO", "VENDOR BILL DATE", "DOC TYPE", "DOC DESCRIPTION", "VENDOR CODE", (SELECT VENDOR_FLAG FROM VENDOR_MASTER WHERE VENDOR_CODE = "VENDOR CODE" ) VENDOR_FLAG, "VENDOR NAME", "PAN NO", "GSTIN NO", "PO NO", "AMD NO", "ITEM CODE", "ITEM DESCRIPTION", (SELECT ITEM_UOM FROM vw_all_item_mas WHERE ITEM_CD = B."ITEM CODE" AND ROWNUM = 1) UOM, "HSN NO", "CHALLAN QTY", "APPROVED QTY", "RECEIVED QTY", RATE, "TAXABLE VALUE BEFORE DISCOUNT", "DISCOUNT %", "DISCOUNT VALUE", "TAXABLE VALUE AFTER DISCOUNT", "GST CODE", GST_RATE, ( SELECT CASE WHEN V.INTER_UNIT = 'Y' THEN 'STO' WHEN B.GST_RATE = 0 THEN 'EXEMPTED' ELSE 'TAXABLE' END PURCHASE_TYPE FROM VENDOR_MASTER V WHERE V.VENDOR_CODE = B."VENDOR CODE") PURCHASE_TYPE, "SGST %", "SGST AMOUNT", "CGST %", "CGST AMOUNT", "IGST %", "IGST AMOUNT", "LINE TOTAL" + NVL(TCS_VALUE,0) "LINE TOTAL" , "GL CODE", "GL DESCRIPTION", "STATE CODE", "VENDOR ADDRESS" ,TCS_VALUE , ( SELECT SUM(A."LINE TOTAL" + NVL(A.TCS_VALUE,0) ) FROM ( Select L.VOU_NO AS "VOUCHER NO" ,(NVL(B.QUANTITY,0) * NVL(B.RATE,0)) + NVL(B.SGST_AMT,0) + NVL(B.CGST_AMT,0) + NVL(B.IGST_AMT,0) AS "LINE TOTAL" ,(SELECT D.VALUE FROM BILL H LEFT JOIN BILL_DETAIL D ON H.BILL_NO = D.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO WHERE H.VOU_NO = L.VOU_NO--'21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' AND D.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT AND D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = 'PART024' --AND D.GL_CD = 'GL-06034' AND ( SELECT MAX(D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD ) ITEM FROM BILL H LEFT JOIN BILL_DETAIL D ON H.BILL_NO = D.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO WHERE H.VOU_NO = L.VOU_NO--'21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' -- AND D.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT --AND D.GL_CD = 'GL-06034' AND D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD != 'PART024' ) = B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD--||''||JOB_CD ) TCS_VALUE from Bill_detail B LEFT JOIN GEN_LED_V10 G ON B.GL_CD = G.GL_CD LEFT JOIN PART_MASTER P ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = P.PART_CODE LEFT JOIN INV_SER_BILL_VIEW S ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = S.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PR ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = PR.CODE --LEFT JOIN JO_BILL_DETAIL J ON B.JOB_DETAIL = J.JOB_DETAIL LEFT JOIN BILL L ON B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO = L.BILL_NO AND B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE = L.BILL_TYPE AND B.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = L.UNIT_CODE --LEFT JOIN VENDOR_MASTER VM ON L.VEN_CD = VM.VENDOR_CODE --LEFT JOIN VENDOR_REGD_ADDRESS VRA ON L.VEN_CD = VRA.VENDOR_CODE --LEFT JOIN STATE SE ON VRA.STATE = SE.NAME WHERE L.VOU_DATE BETWEEN :P254_FROM_DATE AND :P254_TO_DATE AND FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT --AND L.VOU_NO = '21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' AND P.DESCRIPTION||''|| S.ITEM_DESC||''||B.JOB_DETAIL||''||PR.DESCRIPTION != 'TCS RECIVABLE' ) A WHERE A."VOUCHER NO" = B."VOUCHER NO" GROUP BY A."VOUCHER NO" ) INVOICE_VALUE FROM ( Select B.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE AS "UNIT CODE", L.VOU_NO AS "VOUCHER NO", L.VOU_DATE AS "VOUCHER DATE", LPAD (B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO,10,'.') AS "DOC NO", B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_DATE AS "DOC DATE", L.VEN_BILL_NO AS "VENDOR BILL NO", L.VEN_BILL_DATE AS "VENDOR BILL DATE", B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE AS "DOC TYPE", case WHEN B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE = 'P' THEN 'PURCHASE' WHEN B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE = 'V' THEN 'SERVICE' END AS "DOC DESCRIPTION", L.VEN_CD AS "VENDOR CODE", VM.NAME AS "VENDOR NAME", VM.PAN_NO AS "PAN NO", VM.GST_REG_NO AS "GSTIN NO", B.PO_NO AS "PO NO", B.AMD_NO AS "AMD NO", B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD--||''||JOB_CD AS "ITEM CODE", P.DESCRIPTION||''|| S.ITEM_DESC||''||B.JOB_DETAIL||''||PR.DESCRIPTION AS "ITEM DESCRIPTION", B.BILL_HSN_CODE AS "HSN NO", NVL(B.CHALLAN_QTY,0) AS "CHALLAN QTY", NVL(B.APPR_QTY,0) AS "APPROVED QTY", B.QUANTITY AS "RECEIVED QTY", B.RATE AS RATE, NVL(B.QUANTITY * B.RATE,0) AS "TAXABLE VALUE BEFORE DISCOUNT", NVL(B.DISCOUNT_PER,0) AS "DISCOUNT %", (NVL(B.QUANTITY,0) * NVL(B.RATE,0)) * (NVL(B.DISCOUNT_PER,0) / 100) AS "DISCOUNT VALUE", NVL(B.QUANTITY * B.RATE,0) - (NVL(B.QUANTITY,0) * NVL(B.RATE,0)) * (NVL(B.DISCOUNT_PER,0) / 100) AS "TAXABLE VALUE AFTER DISCOUNT", B.GST_CODE AS "GST CODE", (SELECT GST_RATE FROM gst_rate_master WHERE GST_CODE = B.GST_CODE ) GST_RATE, NVL(B.SGST_PER,0) AS "SGST %", NVL(B.SGST_AMT,0) AS "SGST AMOUNT", NVL(B.CGST_PER,0) AS "CGST %", NVL(B.CGST_AMT,0) AS "CGST AMOUNT", NVL(B.IGST_PER,0) AS "IGST %", NVL(B.IGST_AMT,0) AS "IGST AMOUNT", (NVL(B.QUANTITY,0) * NVL(B.RATE,0)) + NVL(B.SGST_AMT,0) + NVL(B.CGST_AMT,0) + NVL(B.IGST_AMT,0) AS "LINE TOTAL", B.GL_CD AS "GL CODE", G.GL_DESC AS "GL DESCRIPTION", SE.STATE_GST_CODE ||'-'|| VRA.STATE AS "STATE CODE", VRA.ADDRESS1 ||' '||VRA.ADDRESS2 ||' '||VRA.ADDRESS3 AS "VENDOR ADDRESS" ,(SELECT D.VALUE FROM BILL H LEFT JOIN BILL_DETAIL D ON H.BILL_NO = D.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO WHERE H.VOU_NO = L.VOU_NO--'21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' AND D.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT AND D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = 'PART024' --AND D.GL_CD = 'GL-06034' AND ( SELECT MAX(D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD ) ITEM FROM BILL H LEFT JOIN BILL_DETAIL D ON H.BILL_NO = D.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO WHERE H.VOU_NO = L.VOU_NO--'21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' -- AND D.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT --AND D.GL_CD = 'GL-06034' AND D.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD != 'PART024' ) = B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD--||''||JOB_CD ) TCS_VALUE from Bill_detail B LEFT JOIN GEN_LED_V10 G ON B.GL_CD = G.GL_CD LEFT JOIN PART_MASTER P ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = P.PART_CODE LEFT JOIN INV_SER_BILL_VIEW S ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = S.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PR ON B.ITEM_STOCK_ITEM_CD = PR.CODE --LEFT JOIN JO_BILL_DETAIL J ON B.JOB_DETAIL = J.JOB_DETAIL LEFT JOIN BILL L ON B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_NO = L.BILL_NO AND B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE = L.BILL_TYPE AND B.FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = L.UNIT_CODE LEFT JOIN VENDOR_MASTER VM ON L.VEN_CD = VM.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN VENDOR_REGD_ADDRESS VRA ON L.VEN_CD = VRA.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN STATE SE ON VRA.STATE = SE.NAME WHERE L.VOU_DATE BETWEEN :P254_FROM_DATE AND :P254_TO_DATE AND FIN_TBENT_UNIT_CODE = :P254_UNIT --AND L.VOU_NO = '21-22/60001/0106/PURC/PV697' AND P.DESCRIPTION||''|| S.ITEM_DESC||''||B.JOB_DETAIL||''||PR.DESCRIPTION != 'TCS RECIVABLE' AND B.FIN_TBENT_BILL_TYPE LIKE '%'||:P254_DOC_TYPE ) B
UNION SELECT D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_UNIT AS "UNIT CODE", DC.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO AS "VOUCHER NO", DC.FIN_TVOUCH_VOU_DATE AS "VOUCHER DATE", D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_NO AS "DOC NO", D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_DATE AS "DOC DATE", DC.BILL_NO_FOR_CREDIT AS "VENDOR BILL NO", DC.BILL_DATE_FOR_CREDIT AS "VENDOR BILL DATE", D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_FLAG AS "DOC TYPE", CASE WHEN D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_FLAG = 'D' THEN 'DEBIT NOTE' WHEN D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_FLAG = 'C' THEN 'CREDIT NOTE' END AS " DOC DESCRIPTION", DC.SUB_CODE AS "VENDOR CODE", (SELECT VENDOR_FLAG FROM VENDOR_MASTER WHERE VENDOR_CODE = DC.SUB_CODE ) VENDOR_FLAG, VN.NAME AS "VENDOR NAME", VN.PAN_NO AS "PAN NO", VN.GST_REG_NO AS "GSTIN NO", ('0') AS "PO NO", (0) AS "AMD NO", D.ITEM_CD AS "ITEM CODE", P.DESCRIPTION||''||S.ITEM_DESC||''||PM.DESCRIPTION AS "ITEM DESCRIPTION", NVL((SELECT ITEM_UOM FROM vw_all_item_mas WHERE ITEM_CD = D.ITEM_CD AND ROWNUM = 1),(SELECT MEASUREMENT_UNIT FROM inv_item_list_view WHERE ITEM_CODE = D.ITEM_CD AND ROWNUM = 1)) UOM, D.HSN_NO AS "HSN NO", (0) AS "CHALLAN QTY", (0) AS "APPROVED QTY", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',D.QTY * -1, D.QTY) AS "RECEIVED QTY", D.RATE AS RATE, DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',NVL(D.QTY * D.RATE,0)*-1,NVL(D.QTY * D.RATE,0)) AS "TAXABLE VALUE BEFORE DISCOUNT", (0) AS "DISCOUNT %", (0) AS "DISCOUNT AMOUNT", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',NVL(D.QTY * D.RATE,0)*-1,NVL(D.QTY * D.RATE,0)) AS "TAXABLE VALUE AFTER DISCOUNT", D.DGST_CODE AS "GST CODE", (SELECT GST_RATE FROM gst_rate_master WHERE GST_CODE = D.DGST_CODE ) GST_RATE, (SELECT CASE WHEN V.INTER_UNIT = 'Y' THEN 'STO' WHEN (SELECT GST_RATE FROM gst_rate_master WHERE GST_CODE = D.DGST_CODE ) = 0 THEN 'EXEMPTED' ELSE 'TAXABLE' END PURCHASE_TYPE FROM VENDOR_MASTER V WHERE V.VENDOR_CODE = DC.SUB_CODE) PURCHASE_TYPE, NVL(D.DSGST_RATE,0) AS "SGST %", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0)*-1,NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0)) AS "SGST AMOUNT", NVL(D.DCGST_RATE,0) AS "CGST %", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0)*-1,NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0)) AS "CGST AMOUNT", NVL(D.DIGST_RATE,0) AS "IGST %", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0)*-1,NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0)) AS "IGST AMOUNT", DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',((NVL(D.QTY,0) * NVL(D.RATE,0)) + NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0))*-1,((NVL(D.QTY,0) * NVL(D.RATE,0)) + NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0))) AS "LINE TOTAL",
(SELECT GL_CD FROM DR_CR_DETAIL WHERE AMOUNT = (SELECT MAX(AMOUNT) FROM DR_CR_DETAIL WHERE DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_NO = ( SELECT DN_CN_NO FROM DR_CR_NOTE WHERE FIN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO = DC.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO ) AND DREMAST_REASON_CODE NOT IN ('SG','CG','IG','RO') ) AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS "GL CODE",
(SELECT GL_DESC FROM GEN_LED_V10 WHERE GL_CD = (SELECT GL_CD FROM DR_CR_DETAIL WHERE AMOUNT = (SELECT MAX(AMOUNT) FROM DR_CR_DETAIL WHERE DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_NO = ( SELECT DN_CN_NO FROM DR_CR_NOTE WHERE FIN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO = DC.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO ) AND DREMAST_REASON_CODE NOT IN ('SG','CG','IG','RO') ) AND ROWNUM = 1 )) AS "GL DESCRIPTION",
ST.STATE_GST_CODE||'-'||VAR.STATE AS "STATE CODE", VAR.ADDRESS1 ||' '|| VAR.ADDRESS2 ||' '|| VAR.ADDRESS3 AS "VENDOR ADDRESS", NULL TCS_VALUE, ( SELECT SUM(DECODE(DN_CN_FLAG,'D',((NVL(D.QTY,0) * NVL(D.RATE,0)) + NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0))*-1,((NVL(D.QTY,0) * NVL(D.RATE,0)) + NVL(D.DSGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DCGST_AMT,0) + NVL(D.DIGST_AMT,0)))) INVOICE_TOTAL -- NULL INVOICE_TOTAL FROM DR_CR_DETAIL_ITEM D LEFT JOIN PART_MASTER P ON D.ITEM_CD = P.PART_CODE LEFT JOIN INV_SER_BILL_VIEW S ON D.ITEM_CD = S.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PM ON D.ITEM_CD = PM.CODE LEFT JOIN DR_CR_NOTE DCN ON D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_NO = DCN.DN_CN_NO LEFT JOIN VENDOR_MASTER VN ON DCN.SUB_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN VENDOR_REGD_ADDRESS VAR ON DCN.SUB_CODE = VAR.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN STATE ST ON VAR.STATE = ST.NAME WHERE DCN.FIN_TVOUCH_VOU_DATE BETWEEN :P254_FROM_DATE AND :P254_TO_DATE AND DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_UNIT = :P254_UNIT AND DCN.SL_CODE_TYPE = 'C' AND DCN.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO = DC.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO--'21-22/60002/3006/JVPV/JV400' GROUP BY DCN.FiN_TVOUCH_VOU_NO ) INVOICE_VALUE FROM DR_CR_DETAIL_ITEM D LEFT JOIN PART_MASTER P ON D.ITEM_CD = P.PART_CODE LEFT JOIN INV_SER_BILL_VIEW S ON D.ITEM_CD = S.ITEM_CD LEFT JOIN PRODUCT PM ON D.ITEM_CD = PM.CODE LEFT JOIN DR_CR_NOTE DC ON D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_NO = DC.DN_CN_NO LEFT JOIN VENDOR_MASTER VN ON DC.SUB_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN VENDOR_REGD_ADDRESS VAR ON DC.SUB_CODE = VAR.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN STATE ST ON VAR.STATE = ST.NAME WHERE DC.FIN_TVOUCH_VOU_DATE BETWEEN :P254_FROM_DATE AND :P254_TO_DATE AND DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_UNIT = :P254_UNIT AND DC.SL_CODE_TYPE = 'C' AND D.DR_CR_NOTE_DN_CN_FLAG LIKE '%'||:P254_DOC_TYPE
